patterns.regex: (?i)a\/c no. [-\w]+(\d{4}).*debited.*(?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}) through Internet Banking fund transfer\. -- (\d{2}\/\d{2}\/\d{2} \d{2}:\d{2})
(?i)Your Credit card.*?xx(\d{4}) payment of (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]?(\d*\.?\d{2}).*? is due on ([a-z:0-9:-]*).
(?i)your account number \d*(\d{6}) has clear balance of (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s|]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2})
(?i)(?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}) has been Debited to Your Account X*(\d{4}) from (ATM) On \d{2}-\d{2}-\d{4}.Available Balance [\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2})

(?i)(Cheque No [\d]*) for (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}) has been debited.* account x*(\d{4}).*(?:Available|avail) (?:bal|balance) [\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2})
(?i)Email ID for (.*?) on .*?, (.*?), at (.*?), seats: (.*?). Booking id: (\w+).
(?i)An amount of (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}) has been debited from your A\/c .*(\d{4}) for an online transaction done at (.*) using CorpNet banking
(?i)A transaction of (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}) has been done using your CorpBank Credit Card \d\*{4}(\d{4}) at (.*)[,].* at .*
(?i)((?:cheque|chq) no.\d*) for (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{0,2}) is debited from your a\/c no. x*(\d{4}) .*balance is (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{0,2})
(?i)Your unsuccessful (ATM).*on.*Card ending (\d{4}) of (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{0,2}) at location (.*) on\s([0-9-:]*) is reversed
(?i)Dear Smart pay customer,We have successfully debited your HDFC Bank credit card to pay your (.*) bill for the amount (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2})
(?i)card ending x*(\d{4}).*Payment due on(.*), Total payment due (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{2})
(?i)Credit card no. x+(\d{4}) for (?:INR|Rs)\s?(\d*\.?\d{0,2}).*\. this txn
(?i)debit card purchase of (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]?([\d,]*\.?\d{2}) on (.*). Info.(.*)\*(.*). Your.*balance is (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]?([\d\,]*\.?\d{2})
(?i) transaction of [a-z]{3} [\.,\s]?([\d,]*\.?\d{2}) on (\d{2}\-[a-z]{3}\-\d{2}) on card x*(\d{4}) is made at (.*)\. Available cr.limit is (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]?([\d,]*\.?\d{2}).*
(?i)available balance in account \w+(\d{4}) is (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{2}) as of (.*) hrs
(?i)\**\d*(\d{4}) has been debited.*(?:INR|Rs)[\.\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{1,2}) towards.*(Debit Card Purchase|ATM|Internet Transfer|NEFT|ECS|Cheque).*available balance is (?:INR|Rs)[\.\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{1,2})
(?i)Cash withdrawal of (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{2}) made on .*X+(\d{4}) on (.*) at (.*)\.Combined balance .*is (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{2})
(?i)(?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}).*debited.*x+(\d{4}).*towards( ecsidr-| ft| cash withdrawal| neft| rtgs|)?(?: to)?\s?(.*)\.combined.*balance is (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2})
(?i)avbl bal for a\/c x*(\d{4}) .*combined avbl bal is (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2})
(?i)Ola(?:,|\s)(.*?)[!\.] Your booking with ([\d\w\s]*) has been (?:received|confirmed) for ([\d\w,: ]*)
(?i)your (?:ola share |auto |kaali peeli |)booking (.*?) (?:has been|had to be) cancelled
(?i)(?:requested to cancel the|cancellation of your) booking (.*?\d\b)
(?i)charge of (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}).*credit card ending with (\d{4}) at (.+) on (.+[ap].?m.?).*available limit is (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2})
(?i)a\/c no. ending x+(\d{4}) .*debited for (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}) on (.+) towards neft.*(utr no \w+).*available bal is (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2})
(?i)account\s*x+(\d{4}) is debited with (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2})\s*on (.+) ref (.+) your net available balance is\s*(?:INR|Rs)?[\.:,\s]*([\d.,]*)
(?i) credit card .*(\d{4}) bill of (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}) with due date (\d{2}\-\d{2}\-\d{4}) has .*
(?i)debit card for withdrawing (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{0,2}).*on (atm \S+) using card.*x+(\d{4}) with txn
(?i)available balance in your account x+\s?\d+(\d{4}) as on (.*) is (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2})
(?i)Transaction of (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}) made on TATA Credit Card X+(\d{4}) at (.*) on
(?i) x*\d*(\d{4}) is debited for (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}) on ([\d,-]*) and .*(IMPS Ref no \d*)
(?i)your A\/c \dX+(\d+) is debited by (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}) bal after debit is (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}) cr.(minimum bal not maintained)
(?i)thank you for using central card \d+x+(\d{4}) for (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}) on (.*) at (.*).
(?i).* bill for card no \d+x+(\d+) is (?:INR|Rs)[\.:,\s]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2}) is due for payment on (.*). Pls.*centralcard
(?i)x*(\d{4}) .* credited (?:by|with) (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{0,2}) .* balance in your account is [\.,\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{0,2})
(?i)balance in your (?:a/c|account no) \d*x*\d*(\d{4}).* on ([\d\w\-]*) is debit (?:INR|Rs)*[\.:,\s|v]*([\d,]+\.?\d{0,2})
(?i)reference number is (\w+)\..*? PNR for (.*?)@(\d{2}:\d{2}) on (.*?) from (.*?) to (.*?) is (\w+)
(?i)and for (.*?)@(\d{2}:\d{2}) on (.*?), (.*?) to (.*?) is (\w+)\..*?reference number is (\w+)
(?i)PNR for (.*?)@(\d{2}:\d{2}) on (.*?), (.*?) to (.*?) is (\w+)\..*?reference number is (\w+)

(?i)landline bill.*(?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{0,2})(?: for)*(?: against)*(?: BSNL)*(?: account)(?: number | no. )(\d{10}) .* total outstanding amount is (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{0,2}).* (?:before |date )(?: is )*([\w\d\-]*)
(?i)landline bill .* (?:account|acc)(?: number| no. )(\d{10}) .* (?:INR|Rs)[\.,\s]*([\d,]*\.?\d{0,2}) .* due date is ([\w\d\-]*)

rules.value: internet using verified by visa services
